Package index

Calculations

Apply standard equations.

calculate_astcat()
Calculate Aspartate Aminotransferase Category
calculate_bmi()
Calculate Body Mass Index
calculate_bsa()
Calculate Body Surface Area
calculate_crcl()
Calculate Creatinine Clearance
calculate_crcl_peck()
Calculate Creatinine Clearance using the Peck Formula
calculate_egfr()
Calculate Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR)
calculate_egfr_child()
Calculate Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate for Children using the Schwartz Formula
calculate_ibw()
Calculate Ideal Body Weight
calculate_ibw_child()
Calculate Ideal Body Weight for Children
calculate_lbm()
Calculate Lean Body Mass
calculate_nciliv()
Calculate NCI Liver Function Group
calculate_rfcat()
Calculate Renal Function Category
calculate_tbilcat()
Calculate Total Bilirubin Category

Data requirements

Import and leverage data requirements.

read_requirements() as_requirements() available_requirements_table()
Get available and latest data requirements files
join_decode_labels() join_decode_levels() decode_tbls_lvl_to_lbl()
Join decode labels or levels
set_labels() `set_labels<-`()
Set variable labels

Data review and manipulation

cnt()
Count observations and unique values by group
set_labels() `set_labels<-`()
Set variable labels
distinct_stationary_variables() stationary_variables()
Subset to stationary content (one row per group)

Decode tables

Extract and join information from decodes.

as_decode_tbl() as_decode_tbls()
Build decode tables
extract_decode_tbl() extract_decode_tbls()
Extract decode tables
extract_decode_tbls_from_data()
Extract decode tables from data
join_decode_labels() join_decode_levels() decode_tbls_lvl_to_lbl()
Join decode labels or levels
print(<decode_tbl>) print(<decode_tbls>)
Print values of decode tables
set_decode_factors()
Create factor variables based on decodes

Import data

read_docx_tables()
Read tables from a Word file (docx)

Search environment data

Search for patterns in variable names, labels, and content.

cnt_search_result()
Count search results
print(<search_result>)
Print search results
search_environment_data()
Search data in an environment for a pattern
in_which()
Find objects containing names

Built in datasets

Example datasets and data requirements generated from pharmaversesdtm datasets.

dmcognigen_conc
PK Concentrations Dataset
dmcognigen_cov
Covariate Dataset
dmcognigen_dose
Dose Dataset
dmcognigen_pk
PK Dataset
dmcognigen_pk_requirements
Example PK Data Requirements
